html:
5.4.17  9:47 am   I'll pay u $50 to get the video up before may 11th

     ok

5.4.17  9:14 am   How many different items are on your list of things to fix in HoTEWIG? And how many have you completed?

     i just finished a list, and now i am making a new list

5.4.17  9:10 am   How to realise yourself in this world?

     it's more fun if no one tells you how

5.4.17  9:06 am   can you have too much fun?

     it depends on what the fun limit is in your area

5.4.17  7:44 am   Can you explain string theory,

     no

     black holes,

     try setting the mass so high it breaks the game

      wormholes,

     when a worm travels from one place to an entirely different place in the universe

      parallel universes,

     when 2 universes are side by side, pointed in the same direction

     time travel,

     so far it is the only type of travel that exists. it takes time to travel

      movies,

     it's a video story

     video games,

     it's like an interactive movie

      money,

     it's the points you earn, in real life

     computers,

     it's when people start to make people, out of metal

      and yourself?

     i am trying

      I hope that was a good question

5.4.17  7:32 am   When I ask "what's your name" why does it say "I'll look into it"?

     i think it says "i will check" but that's not really true. i already know what my name is, and i think you should too. i've been very open about that on this website, especially in the title of the website

5.4.17  7:31 am   what amount of what questions do you answer?

     medium

5.4.17  4:04 am   why do i not know what anyone is doing or why they are doing it?

     i don't know, but that's normal. in time you might be able to figure it out, based on your own experience

5.4.17  3:53 am   you can't be you forever

     that's why i'm trying to do the best i can, as quickly as possible

5.4.17  3:46 am   Everyone always seems so preoccupied with doing Things, but I'm not sure I fit in with this Thing-based society. Would it be possible that, if I were to concentrate hard enough on my lack of Thing, that the non-Thing could sustain itself? Is it okay if I just do noThing?

     you could try it and see if it's right for you

5.4.17  3:46 am   how do i sleep

     get so tired your brain starts making up its own reality. try to do it lying down in a safe place

5.4.17  2:56 am   How do I tell my thoughts to quiet down without hurting their feelings?

     try to have an open, balanced discussion, between you, your thoughts, your feelings, your thoughts' feelings, your feelings' thoughts, and anyone else who would like to attend

5.4.17  1:58 am   What do I do when I'm constantly overwhelmed by my own impossibly high expectations for myself?

     try to do the best you can

5.4.17  1:58 am   Some of the questions that you put on the "I don't understand the question" page are actually pretty straight forward.

     i disagree, but i respect your opinion

      Do you just put things there you don't want to answer?

     usually it's when people just name a thing with a question mark. or maybe 2 things, but don't specify what they would like to know about those 2 things. for example, if someone said 'is the sky blue' i could perhaps try to evaluate whether it is blue. but if they just say "the sky" i'm left empty handed. if they are pointing to a picture, and they say "the sky?" then i can try to evaluate whether the picture is a picture of the sky. but if they do it with no picture, i'm stuck. if it's 2 things, like if they say "the sky or the ground" and they show me a picture, then i can assume they want me to figure out whether the picture is a picture of the sky or the ground, or neither. but again if they do it with no picture i'm sorry i really don't understand what's going on
5.4.17  1:56 am   Yes or no, will the video be out before june

5.4.17  1:33 am   do you want to focus on youtube, or are you trying to be more of a multimedia netizen?

     i always try to focus on whatever platforms are available to me, and/or happen to be most commonly used at the time

5.4.17  1:21 am   how can i motivate myself to work

     do a project you want done
5.4.17  1:09 am   When will more of your songs be available on Spotify? I really want icy James to be on it.

5.4.17  1:06 am   Do you like lots of things or just a small amount of things?

     how about a medium amount of things, of assorted sizes

5.4.17  12:39 am   do you dabble in recreational sadness?

     no

5.4.17  12:36 am   How do you feel about Ray Kurzweil's singularity prediction?

     seems legit

5.3.17  11:47 pm   why do humans consider certain things "weird"?

     because they thought they had figured out how things were supposed to be

5.3.17  11:33 pm   Will you create a new version of Happy Birthday like you did for the ABC's? I can't stand the original.

     i would consider it

5.3.17  11:24 pm   What's your favorite graph?

     seismo

5.3.17  11:23 pm   do you still enjoy making music and videos or does it feel more like a job?

     the fun has barely even started

5.3.17  11:16 pm   Hey do you like matter?

     it's ok

5.3.17  11:09 pm   If there was one chord in music that you would name after yourself,

     no thanks

      what would it be? I suggest a suspended 2nd chord with the bass playing the 3rd.
5.3.17  10:51 pm   what is your motivation for answering these questions?
5.3.17  10:37 pm   what should i do when im sad?

5.3.17  10:34 pm   metaphysically speaking, is time relative, or is it just a coping mechanism for happenings?

     sure

5.3.17  10:26 pm   How long has it been since you started working on the video? I lost track.

     about 10 and a half months

5.3.17  10:26 pm   how many days are in a light year?

     it depends how fast you are going but if you are going the speed of light then it would be about 365 days

5.3.17  9:17 pm   best thing about humans

     they might invent themselves

5.3.17  9:00 pm   How can I make something like the way you make your somethings?

     don't let anyone tell you how to make things
5.3.17  7:54 pm   Can you please make more "history of" videos..... please!

5.3.17  6:21 pm   what to do if you like so many things that there's no way you'd have time to get good at all of them and you can't decide which to turn into a career?

     if you listen very very carefully and pay very close attention, you might be able to figure out which one is screaming a tiny bit louder than the others
5.3.17  6:01 pm   heyo man I hope you are having good times. how did you get into doing music stuff??
5.3.17  5:08 pm   any plans for live shows?

5.3.17  4:56 pm   Could you carefully explain the meaning of why we are here,

     we could be anywhere, but 'here' means where you are, so here we are

     why anything exists,

     to see what it's like

     how life came to be,

     i'm not sure

      how earth isnt venus 2.0 yet,

     i thought venus was earth 2.0

     and how the ocean tastes?

     probably like salt and a little bit of plastic

      With pristine precision?
5.3.17  3:56 pm   Did you ever check where the fun has gone? If so, where is it? And will it ever come back?

5.3.17  3:29 pm   i like singing

     ah, me too
5.3.17  3:20 pm   Hey Bill, will your video be out before the AP World History test on May eleventh? (For my school anyways) P.S. We watched your Japan video in class it was great ;)

5.3.17  3:12 pm   what should i do if i'm tired?

     sleep, go ice climbing, etc. that sort of thing

5.3.17  2:56 pm   how does world work

     somehow dna got invented out of nowhere and then what the fuck

5.3.17  2:52 pm   Have you considered making a video that is All Lies? I think the next video (after "that one") should contain more lies. Thank you for your time I appreciate it.

     fiction has always been an important part of my repertoire, and i will continue to use it in the future
5.3.17  2:25 pm   When is the next video coming out?

5.3.17  1:53 pm   How's The Video coming along?

     wild and crazy

5.3.17  1:38 pm   Do you actually have a Tumblr? I found an image of shoes on your keyboard there

     i made one in 2013 and then immediately realized that i would rather make my own website

5.3.17  12:49 pm   I know you're a proponent of the idea that we're free to do whatever we won't do,

     not necessarily. that was a lyric i used, in a piece of music

      but are we free to do what we do not want to do?

     yes. you can even try it once in a while, just to test

5.3.17  12:47 pm   Can you explain faith,

     it's believing stuff

      life,

     it's when stuff learns how to clone itself

      existence,

     it's what 'is' means

     the universe,

     i guess it's the time and space where we live

      luck,

     it's what happens when you don't make anything happen

      HoTEWIG,

     no

     randomness,

     it's like cause and effect, but without the cause

      order,

     it's like a thinking exercise

      imagination,

     making worlds

      intelligence,

     it's like a cube with only one side

      measurement,

     sizing things up

      time,

     do you remember when i said remember

     space,

     it's wild you can be places

     facts

     things you think are true

      and opinions?

     things someone else thinks are not true
